get.description: By using the initial/Wrong GET endpoint, you will see welcome message(welcome to Booking_bridge)

post.description: This endpoint allows users to register by providing their email and password.

201.description: Account created successfully. Please check email to verify account.

post.description: This endpoint allows users to request an email verification link.

requestBody.description: User email to send the verification link to.

get.description: This endpoint allows users to verify their email using a token.

post.description: This endpoint allows users to log in using their email and password.

400.description: Invalid email or password or account not verified

post.description: This endpoint allows users to request a password reset by providing their email address.

put.description: This endpoint allows users to reset their password using a token.

400.description: Invalid token or account not verified

get.description: This endpoint allows an admin to get a list of all users.
This endpoint allows an admin to get details of a user by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to be fetched

put.description: This endpoint allows an admin to update the role of a user by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to be updated

409.description: Account already exists. Please verify your account.

get.description: This endpoint allows a user to get their profile information.

put.description: This endpoint allows a user to update their profile information, including their profile picture.
